tweet.text: Current or recent grad student in the history of U.S. relations with Latin America? Interested in promoting transparency? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications open from Sept. 28 to Oct. 12: https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/sRwmkgdxzh
tweet.html: Current or recent grad student in the history of U.S. relations with Latin America? Interested in promoting transparency? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications open from Sept. 28 to Oct. 12: bit.ly/OH-PMF
